definition: to prevent/to avoid/to excuse/to exempt/to relieve/(of a debt) to remit
to excuse sb/to exempt/to remove or dismiss from office/to avoid/to avert/to escape/to be prohibited
to get rid of/to remove/to exclude/to eliminate/to wipe out/to divide/except/not including

sentences.english: The new bridge over the railroad tracks eliminated danger in cros, sing.
sentences.chinese: 這座新垮越鐵軌的橋免除了越過鐵軌時的危險。

sentences.english: We disclaim all liability for all materials on your site.
sentences.chinese: 我們免除所有責任都在你們工地材料。

sentences.english: The government wants the European Union to permit visa-free travel for Turkish citizens.
sentences.chinese: 土耳其政府希望歐盟應當爲土耳其公民免除簽證。

sentences.english: Why does the state exempt banks from the law of contradiction?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼政府要免除銀行的違法之罪？

sentences.english: Exempt withdrawals made up to the required minimum amount from taxation.
sentences.chinese: 從稅收的要求的最低金額中免除提款。

sentences.english: Ask to have your credit card’s annual fee waived.
sentences.chinese: 要求免除你信用卡的年費。

sentences.english: Learn from others. It saves you a lot of grief.
sentences.chinese: 向他人學習可以免除你的許多痛苦。

sentences.english: Before purchase should be thoughtful, and use to see from the problems.
sentences.chinese: 購置前應考慮周到，免除使用時才發現的困擾。
我懇求免除分派的那個任務。

sentences.english: Jina trouble to remove your bathroom cabinets have emerged.
sentences.chinese: 爲了免除您的集納煩惱，浴室櫃應運而生。

sentences.english: But now if you were given the right to abolish one of them, which would you choose?
sentences.chinese: 但現在如果給你權利，可以免除一項，您會作何選擇？

sentences.english: However, there shall be no such exoneration of the Fund with regard to preventive measures.
sentences.chinese: 但是，就預防措施而言，本基金不得享有此種免除。

sentences.english: The investigation absolved them of any wrongdoing.
sentences.chinese: 調查免除了他們對所有的壞事的責任。

sentences.english: Additionally, the Entertainment Industry Foundation has waived all administrative fees.
sentences.chinese: 此外，娛樂產業基金會已經免除了所有的管理費。

sentences.english: First, it means “to cancel a debt, to pardon or remit guilt.”
sentences.chinese: 首先，它表示“取消債務，原諒或免除罪過。”

definition: to reduce or waive (taxes, punishment, rent, tuition etc)
to be saved from/to be spared (something)
to remove/to sack/to get rid of/to relieve (sb of their duties)/to free/to lift (an embargo)/to rescind (an agreement)
to remarry (of widow)/to pass on (blame, cost, obligation, unpleasant consequence etc)/to transfer (blame, guilt)/to pass the buck
to have the right to/to be entitled to/to have authority/powerful
to save from damage/to preserve/to maintain/to keep in good repair/(Tw) security guard
